LEFT JOIN t_suppliers temp_suppliers ON temp_suppliers.supplier_id =temp_purchase_order.supplier_id LEFT JOIN t_warehouse temp_warehouse ON temp_warehouse.warehouse_id =temp_purchase_order.storage LEFT JOIN t_par_purchase_type temp_purchase_type ON temp_purchase_type.purchase_type_id =temp_purchase_order.purchase_type_id LEFT JOIN t_user temp_user ON temp_user.user_id =temp_purchase_order.operators LEFT JOIN t_par_com_payment_type temp_com_payment_type ON temp_com_payment_type.payment_type_id =temp_purchase_order.payment_type_id LEFT JOIN t_par_com_deliver_type temp_com_deliver_type ON temp_com_deliver_type.deliver_type_id =temp_purchase_order.delivery_type LEFT JOIN t_par_suppliers_contact temp_par_suppliers_contact ON temp_par_suppliers_contact.supplier_contact_id =temp_purchase_order.linkman
mapper.select:
select
,
from t_purchase_order temp_purchase_order
where temp_purchase_order.pur_order_id = #{purOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
